languages.text: Whenever the Overseer {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relays{/g} a psychic power, a random enemy in a 4-cell radius around the psyber-raven becomes immobilised for 1 round. If that enemy is already immobilised, it suffers +1 stack of perplexed instead.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the Overseer {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relays{/g} a psychic power, a random enemy in a 4-cell radius around the psyber-raven becomes immobilised for 1 round. If that enemy is already immobilised, it suffers +1 stack of perplexed instead.

languages.text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relays{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g}, a random enemy in a 4-cell radius around the psyber-raven becomes {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. If that enemy is already immobilised, it suffers +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g} instead.
languages.original_text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}надзиратель{/g} {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}ретранслирует{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосилу{/g}, случайный противник в радиусе 4 клеток от псайберворона оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвижен{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. Если этот противник уже обездвижен, вместо этого он получает +1 уровень {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}замешательства{/g}.

If that enemy is already immobilised, it suffers +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g} instead.

languages.text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}надзиратель{/g} {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}ретранслирует{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосилу{/g}, случайный противник в радиусе 4 клеток от псайберворона оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвижен{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. Если этот противник уже обездвижен, вместо этого он получает +1 уровень {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}замешательства{/g}.

If that enemy is already immobilised, it suffers +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g} instead.

traits.locale_text: Когда надзиратель {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}ретранслирует{/g} психосилу, случайный противник в радиусе 4 клеток от псайберворона оказывается обездвижен на 1 раунд. Если этот противник уже обездвижен, вместо этого он получает +1 уровень замешательства.

Когда надзиратель {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}ретранслирует{/g} психосилу, случайный противник в радиусе 4 клеток от псайберворона оказывается обездвижен на 1 раунд. Если этот противник уже обездвижен, вместо этого он получает +1 уровень замешательства.

languages.text: Wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufseher{/g} eine {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionische Kraft{/g} {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}umlenkt{/g}, wird ein zufälliger Gegner in einem Radius von 4 Feldern um den Psitech-Raben 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}gelähmt{/g}. Ist der Gegner bereits gelähmt, wird er stattdessen mit +1 Stapel "{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Überrascht{/g}" belegt.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relays{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g}, a random enemy in a 4-cell radius around the psyber-raven becomes {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. If that enemy is already immobilised, it suffers +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g} instead.

traits.locale_text: Wenn der Aufseher eine psionische Kraft {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}umlenkt{/g}, wird ein zufälliger Gegner in einem Radius von 4 Feldern um den Psitech-Raben 1 Runde lang gelähmt. Ist der Gegner bereits gelähmt, wird er stattdessen mit +1 Stapel "Überrascht" belegt.

languages.text: Chaque fois que le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g} {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relaie{/g} un {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoir psychique{/g}, un ennemi aléatoire dans un rayon de 4 cases autour de la psyber-corneille est {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilisé{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Si cet ennemi est déjà immobilisé, il reçoit +1 cumul de {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Perplexité{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relays{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g}, a random enemy in a 4-cell radius around the psyber-raven becomes {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. If that enemy is already immobilised, it suffers +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g} instead.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que le surveillant {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relaie{/g} un pouvoir psychique, un ennemi aléatoire dans un rayon de 4 cases autour de la psyber-corneille est immobilisé pendant 1 round. Si cet ennemi est déjà immobilisé, il reçoit +1 cumul de Perplexité.

languages.text: 每当生化渡鸦{g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}中继{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}时，距生化渡鸦4格内的一名随机敌人都会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}状态，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。如果目标敌人已经处于定身状态，则获得1层{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}困惑{/g}效果。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relays{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g}, a random enemy in a 4-cell radius around the psyber-raven becomes {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. If that enemy is already immobilised, it suffers +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g} instead.

traits.locale_text: 每当生化渡鸦{g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}中继{/g}监察官的灵能能力时，距生化渡鸦4格内的一名随机敌人都会陷入定身状态，持续一轮。如果目标敌人已经处于定身状态，则获得1层困惑效果。

languages.text: Cuando el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g} {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}transmite{/g} un {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poder psíquico{/g}, un enemigo al azar en un radio de 4 casillas del cibercuervo queda {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizado{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}. Si el enemigo ya estaba inmovilizado, sufre 1 acumulación de {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplejo{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relays{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g}, a random enemy in a 4-cell radius around the psyber-raven becomes {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. If that enemy is already immobilised, it suffers +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g} instead.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el supervisor {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}transmite{/g} un poder psíquico, un enemigo al azar en un radio de 4 casillas del cibercuervo queda inmovilizado durante 1 asalto. Si el enemigo ya estaba inmovilizado, sufre 1 acumulación de perplejo.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}監督官{/g}が{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}超能力{/g}を{g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}中継する{/g}場合、サイバーレイヴンの半径4セルにいるランダムな敵1体が1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}になる。その敵がすでに移動不可の場合、代わりに+1スタックの{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}混乱{/g}を受ける。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relays{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g}, a random enemy in a 4-cell radius around the psyber-raven becomes {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. If that enemy is already immobilised, it suffers +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g} instead.

traits.locale_text: 監督官が超能力を{g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}中継する{/g}場合、サイバーレイヴンの半径4セルにいるランダムな敵1体が1ラウンドの間移動不可になる。その敵がすでに移動不可の場合、代わりに+1スタックの混乱を受ける。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g}, bir {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}ruhsezi gücünü{/g} {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}aktardığında{/g} ruhsiber kuzgunun etrafındaki 4 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan rastgele bir düşman {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}felç{/g} olur. Bu etki, 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer. Düşman zaten felç hâlindeyse bunun yerine +1 {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}şaşkınlık{/g} birikimine maruz kalır.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relays{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g}, a random enemy in a 4-cell radius around the psyber-raven becomes {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. If that enemy is already immobilised, it suffers +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g} instead.

traits.locale_text: Gözetmen, bir ruhsezi gücünü {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}aktardığında{/g} ruhsiber kuzgunun etrafındaki 4 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan rastgele bir düşman felç olur. Bu etki, 1 raunt sürer. Düşman zaten felç hâlindeyse bunun yerine +1 şaşkınlık birikimine maruz kalır.

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g}, bir ruhsezi gücünü {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}aktardığında{/g} ruhsiber kuzgunun etrafındaki 4 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan rastgele bir düşman felç olur. Bu etki, 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer. Düşman zaten felç hâlindeyse bunun yerine +1 şaşkınlık birikimine maruz kalır.
